snippet: ABRAMSON--Richard. The Long Island Hearing and Speech Society mourns the death of Richard Abramson. Brother of our Medical Director, Dr. Allan Abramson, and father of our Vice President, Gregg Abramson. Richard generously supported the hearing and speech impaired, whom we serve. Jonathan Leigh, President 1/3
